DatabaseApplication.​Program
DatabaseApplication.​Program

This is the entry point for the <DatabaseApplication> and manages the console intput loop.

Functions
Main
static void Main(
string[] args
)

The main function for <DatabaseApplication>, holds the console input loop

Variables
active

maintains the console input loop

controller

The object that maintains and controlls the <DatabaseApplication> threads

Input
input

the input from the console

command

the portion of the input that determines which instruction to carry out

parameter

the part of a command that may be passed into a function as a parameter
